item.title: About
item.description: I am a UX Resarcher and a Human Factors Engineer As a UX researcher at UX studio, a Budapest-based UX agency, I use various research methods to help clients explore, analyze, test, and validate different product and business ideas. Before starting my agency career in Europe, I spent my time working in the automotive industry in the United States. As a human factors engineer at Honda Research Institute USA, I helped design and evaluate the human-machine interface (HMI) for future vehicles.
